701820f-a.title: Bronx: Soundview Avenue - Watson Avenue
701820f-a.text:
Soundview Ave., north from Watson Ave. to Westchester Ave. (its
terrinus), showing the Soundview Ave. elevated station of the I.R.T.
Pelham Bay Park subway line, on the latter thoroughfare.
July 30, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
701820f-a.folder: Soundview Avenue & Watson Avenue, Bronx, NY
